documentation.text: Abort the purchase and reclaim ether. Can only be called by seller before contract is locked

Confirm the purchase as buyer. Transaction has to include `2*value` ether.
 The ether will be locked until confirmReceived is called
Confirm that buyer recevied the item. This will release locked ether
This function refunds the seller i.e pays back the locked funds of seller

InvalidState().notice: The function cannot be called in current state

OnlyBuyer().notice: Only buyer can call this function

OnlySeller().notice: Only seller can call this function

ValueNotEven().notice: The provided value has to be even

abort().notice: Abort the purchase and reclaim ether. Can only be called by seller before contract is locked

confirmPurchase().notice: Confirm the purchase as buyer. Transaction has to include `2*value` ether. The ether will be locked until confirmReceived is called

confrimReceived().notice: Confirm that buyer recevied the item. This will release locked ether

refundSeller().notice: This function refunds the seller i.e pays back the locked funds of seller
